long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Choose and set Smartcric Cricket customized background in new tab on your Chrome web browser.

Smartcric Extension provides you customized Cricket background to your new tab. Cricket fans can see different background skins. Smartcric gives you an amazing experience to best artwork and make you feel more Sports enthusiast while using this chrome extension.

User can have a new random Cricket background designs on a new tab page, download the extension and get an awesome experience with a great design for the browser new tab page

What is Smartcric App?

Smartcric is an app for Cricket lovers, they stream live cricket score and matches. and fully prepared to live stream cricket World cup 2022. This app is a big fan followers around the world whereas cricket is playing and watching. By using this extension you can customized your Chrome browser tabs with customized wallpapers that explode your cricket spirit while surfing internet online.
